author: Kelly-Ann Mills
title: New dad downs bottle of tequila in nightclub for bet - then dies minutes later
text:
Thank you for subscribing!   
The dad of a newborn baby died after downing a bottle of tequila without stopping in a bid to win a £700 bet. 
Kelvin Rafael Mejia collapsed seconds after being handed the cash on stage at a nightclub in the Dominic Republic. 
The 23-year-old, stood on stage wearing a black T-shirt with a skull motif, was recorded on a mobile phone necking the drink. 
The crowd were whooping and cheering as he woozily raises he arms in triumph and then stands with his hand out as the cash is counted into it. 
The prize money was reported as 40,000 Domincan Pesos - around £682. Kelvin drinks the entire bottle of tequila in one go (Photo: CEN) Read More Millionaire's son kills himself and pal in huge fireball after ploughing Porsche into mum and toddler's parked car 
But seconds after collecting his prize, Kelvin who had just a month ago had become a father, collapsed unconscious. 
He was taken to a nearby clinic called Coral where he died despite doctors’ efforts to save him. 
Police say there are varying accounts of how the fatal gamble came about. 
Management at the Vacca Lounge in the city of La Romana sent out a statement denying they had organised the deadly game. 
It read: "We have received the sad news that a client who was in our disco pub died of alcoholic intoxication. 
"It is very sad and it affects us personally. Kelvin is paid for completing the challenge (Photo: CEN) 
"On the other hand, we publish this press statement because there are people saying that the young man participated in a contest organised by our disco pub but this is totally false as we have never organised this kind of contest or given cash as a prize. "The only contests we ever do are dance contests or costume contests, with the award of bottle of champagne or other drink. 
"This thing happened because some clients were betting money about who of them was able to drink more tequila. A young man approached them and said that he was going to drink it and then he would receive the money." 
Local media reported that the man was the father of a month-old baby and that he was considered as a healthy, very friendly young man. Like us on Facebook
